Sentencas: In this work, an energy and entropy analysis was carried out in a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Energy and entropy study of a SOFC using biogas from different sources considering internal reforming of methane

Sentencas: Four different biogas compositions were considered in the study.
Titulo: Energy and entropy study of a SOFC using biogas from different sources considering internal reforming of methane

Sentencas: The biogas was obtained from different sources: (i) agricultural waste, (ii) local sludge, (iii) industrial waste and (iv) methane fermentation.
Titulo: Energy and entropy study of a SOFC using biogas from different sources considering internal reforming of methane

Sentencas: The research was based on a three-dimensional CFD model that took into account the transport of mass, heat and chemical species.
Titulo: Energy and entropy study of a SOFC using biogas from different sources considering internal reforming of methane

Sentencas: The electrochemical reactions of H-2 and CO, the chemical reactions of methane steam reformer (MSR) and the water-gas shift reaction (WGSR) were also considered.
Titulo: Energy and entropy study of a SOFC using biogas from different sources considering internal reforming of methane

Sentencas: The local and global contributions of the entropy generation rate were calculated for the biogas compositions.
Titulo: Energy and entropy study of a SOFC using biogas from different sources considering internal reforming of methane

Sentencas: The results show that the main contribution to the irreversibilities is due to the activation loss, corresponding up to 40% of the global entropy generation, followed by the methane steam reformer and water gas shift chemical reactions, representing almost 30% of the global entropy generation.
Titulo: Energy and entropy study of a SOFC using biogas from different sources considering internal reforming of methane

Sentencas: Therefore, the use of biogas as a fuel considering the chemical reactions of MSR and WGSR has a meaningful contribution in the thermodynamic irreversibilities that occur inside the SOFC.
Titulo: Energy and entropy study of a SOFC using biogas from different sources considering internal reforming of methane

Sentencas: Finally, the methane fermentation and the agricultural waste show the maximum and the minimum entropy generation rate, respectively.
Titulo: Energy and entropy study of a SOFC using biogas from different sources considering internal reforming of methane
